title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions       Be sure to visit the other Flagstaff Area National Monuments: Wupatki National Monument 16 mi Walnut Canyon National Monument 25 mi Other National Park Service Areas Grand Canyon National Park 101 mi Montezuma Castle National Monument 70 mi  Petrified Forest National Park 110 mi  Glen Canyon National Recreation Area 145 mi   Other Attractions Meteor Crater 50 mi  Museum of Northern Arizona 30 mi  The Arboretum at Flagstaff 35 mi  Coconino National Forest 1 mi   Local Information Resources "Ancient Times" - the park newspaper (pdf, 1250 KB) Flagstaff Convention & Visitors Bureau
